    • peridot.Archiver.Spreadsheet.Info

    Spreadsheet

    public static class Spreadsheet.Info
extends java.lang.Object
    Meta-information about a spreadsheet file.

        public Info(java.io.File tableFile)
     throws java.io.IOException
        R-Peridot tries to guess the Spreadsheet.Info of a spreadsheet.
        Parameters:
        tableFile - The .csv or .tsv file to be analyzed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If failed to read the table file.
